myTopics.pageSubtitle: Explore all the subjects you've studied. Click on a topic to review your personalized materials.
myTopics.noTopicsCardSubtitle: Start studying by generating materials, and your topics will appear here!

channelVideos.noVideosSubtitle: This channel might not have any videos yet, or there was an issue fetching them.
settingsModal.title: Settings
landing.heroTitle: Supercharge Your Studies with Study Room
landing.heroSubtitle: Generate personalized study materials, take interactive quizzes, battle friends, and learn from a vibrant community. Your ultimate academic companion is here!
landing.featuresSubtitle: Explore a suite of tools designed to make learning effective, engaging, and fun.
landing.feature1Desc: Instantly generate summaries, mind maps, flashcards, and more from any content.
landing.feature2Desc: Test your knowledge with AI-generated quizzes and get real-time feedback.
landing.feature3Desc: Challenge friends or AI in exciting quiz battles and climb the leaderboards.
landing.feature4Desc: Share notes, discuss topics, and learn collaboratively with peers.
landing.feature5Desc: Engage in live sessions with real-time transcription and AI doubt resolution.
landing.feature6Desc: Tailor your learning path based on your academic level and exam preferences.
landing.howItWorksSubtitle: Three simple steps to transform your study routine.
landing.step1Desc: Provide text, images, videos, or YouTube links you want to study.
landing.step2Desc: Our AI analyzes your content and generates a complete study package.
landing.step3Desc: Use interactive tools, quizzes, and community features to master your subjects.
landing.ctaSubtitle: Join thousands of students transforming their studies with Study Room.
upcomingLive.pageSubtitle: Stay updated with our schedule of live interactive sessions.
upcomingLive.latestClassDescriptionPlace: Join us for an in-depth discussion on today's hot topic. Real-time Q&A and interactive quizzes await!
upcomingLive.fetchErrorGeneric: Failed to fetch latest live class information.
upcomingLive.fetchErrorNetwork: Could not load latest live class information. Please check your connection and try again.
upcomingLive.noLiveClassSubtitle: Please check back later for upcoming live sessions.
redeem.pageSubtitle: Convert your hard-earned points into valuable PW Coins and unlock exclusive benefits!
redeem.banner1Desc: Redeem points this week and get double the PW Coins. Don't miss out!
redeem.banner2Desc: Use your PW Coins to access exclusive study materials and masterclasses.
redeem.batch1Desc: Comprehensive preparation for JEE Main & Advanced. Early bird discount available!
redeem.batch2Desc: Focused coaching for NEET UG aspirants. Includes doubt sessions and test series.
redeem.batch3Desc: Build a strong foundation for your Civil Services Exam preparation.
redeem.loginPromptSubtitle: Please log in to view and redeem your points.
